main.fairTitle: RISING CITY & BUILDING AND LIFE FAIR 2025

description.title: Rising City & Building and Life Fair that makes Bursa's voice heard
description.p1: Organized once a year under the leadership of Bursa Chamber of Commerce and Industry with the professional organization of KFA Fuarcılık, Rising City & Building and Life Fair Bursa Construction, Building Materials and Technologies Fair and Rising City & Building and Life Fair Bursa Real Estate Fair aim to find new markets for domestic producers operating in the construction and real estate sectors, create business opportunities, and establish business partnerships.
description.p2: Held in an area of over 10,000 square meters at the Bursa International Fair Center, the fair, showcasing services in the construction and real estate sectors, offers a business-oriented experience focused on technology and trends to both visitors and exhibitors.

infoPanel.title: Fair Information
infoPanel.locationValue: Bursa International Fair and Congress Center

sidebar.subTitle: Bursa Fair Center
sidebar.bfmReadyOffices: BFM Ready Offices and Meeting Rooms

content.missionText: To contribute to our country's exports by enabling our companies to open up to new markets and develop their existing markets.
content.visionText: To be a leading fair center providing services at international standards by continuously exceeding the expectations of our exhibitors and visitors in the exhibition sector.
content.historyText1: Bursa Fair Center (BFM) was established in 2015 by KFA Fuarcılık A.Ş. KFA Fuarcılık is managed by a professional team with over 30 years of experience in the exhibition sector.
content.historyText2: BFM aims to increase the competitiveness of companies in the region in national and international markets by leveraging Bursa's strategic location and industrial potential.
content.historyText3: With its modern infrastructure, large exhibition areas, and comprehensive services, BFM has quickly become one of Turkey's important fair centers.
content.locationText1: BFM provides an advantage with its close location to Bursa city center and easy transportation facilities.
content.locationText2: It is 45 km from Yenişehir Airport and approximately 1.5 hours from Istanbul Sabiha Gökçen Airport.
content.locationText3: Transportation is easily accessible by public transport and private vehicles.
content.servicesText: BFM offers a wide range of services to its exhibitors and visitors, such as fair organization, stand design and construction, technical support, accommodation, transportation, catering, and other support services.
content.collaborationText: BFM collaborates with many local and national institutions and organizations, especially the Bursa Chamber of Commerce and Industry (BTSO). Through these collaborations, we aim to maximize the effectiveness of our fairs and participant satisfaction.

hakkimizda.title: About Us
hakkimizda.text1: Since its establishment, Bursa Chamber of Commerce and Industry (BTSO) has been working to facilitate the commercial activities of its members, find solutions to sectoral problems, and contribute to the economy of Bursa and the country.
hakkimizda.text2: With over 40,000 members, BTSO is one of the largest chambers of commerce and industry in Turkey. More than 60 sector councils operating within the Chamber identify the sectoral problems and solution proposals of their members and bring them to the relevant platforms.
hakkimizda.text3: BTSO carries out various projects to increase the international competitiveness of its members. These projects include Ur-Ge (Development of International Competitiveness), Global Fair Agency, and Commercial Safari.
hakkimizda.text4: BTSO makes various investments to contribute to the development of Bursa's economy. These investments include projects such as Bursa Technology Organized Industrial Zone (TEKNOSAB), Bursa Model Factory, and Energy Efficiency Center (EVM).
hakkimizda.text5: BTSO also adds value to Bursa with its social responsibility projects. Projects implemented by the Chamber include BTSO Education Valley and BTSO Vocational Qualification Testing and Certification Center (MESYEB).

baskanMesaji.title: President's Message
baskanMesaji.name: İbrahim BURKAY
baskanMesaji.paragraph1: As Bursa Chamber of Commerce and Industry, we continue our work with the vision of leading the economic development of our city and country. In this direction, our primary priority is to maximize the potential of Bursa, increase the competitiveness of our business world, and ensure sustainable growth.
baskanMesaji.paragraph2: Bursa Fair Center (BFM) is an important part of this vision. With its modern infrastructure, large exhibition areas, and comprehensive services, BFM has become a significant exhibition center not only for Bursa but also for the entire region and Turkey. Hosting dozens of national and international fairs every year, our center brings together thousands of companies and professionals from different sectors, enabling the establishment of new collaborations, the development of commercial relations, and the monitoring of the latest innovations in the sectors.
baskanMesaji.paragraph3: BFM is also an ideal venue for congresses, seminars, meetings, and various corporate events. Its technological equipment and flexible hall structure allow for the successful execution of all kinds of organizations.
baskanMesaji.paragraph4: As Bursa Chamber of Commerce and Industry, we continue our investments to ensure the continuous development of BFM and its provision of services at international standards. Our goal is to make BFM a globally recognized and preferred fair and congress center.
baskanMesaji.paragraph5: The contributions and participation of you, our esteemed business world representatives, are of great importance in achieving this goal. By participating in the fairs and events held at BFM, you can both create new opportunities for your own businesses and support the promotion and economic development of Bursa and Turkey.
baskanMesaji.paragraph6: Looking towards the future with hope, I fully believe that our cooperation and joint efforts will carry Bursa and our country even further.

content.prayerRoomText: Bursa Fair Center has separate prayer rooms for men and women to allow our visitors and exhibitors to perform their prayers comfortably. Our prayer rooms are located at easily accessible points within the fairground.
